pages.title: Reforging
pages.text: $(br)Every tool and piece of armor you obtain can have special $(bold)affixes$() that provide extra stats.$(br2)You can use $(key)Reforge Scrolls$() at a $(key)Reforge Table$() to reforge your gear. Higher-tier $(key)Reforge Scrolls$() have a higher chance to roll better $(bold)affixes$().

pages.title: Fusion Smithing
pages.text: $(br)A $(key)Fusion Smithing Template$() allows you to transfer $(bold)enchantments$(), $(bold)Enchanted Essence upgrades$(), and more from one piece of gear to another.$(br2)Use it in a $(key)Smithing Table$().
